General.Name: Visiomed Group
General.Description: Visiomed Group SA, together with its subsidiaries, provides healthcare technology and services in France and internationally. It offers BewellConnect, an eco-system of health solutions including enriched and assisted teleconsultation, remote home monitoring, hospital monitoring, tele-expertise, tele-assistance, and tele-regulations; and Smart Salem, a medical fitness screening device. Visiomed Group SA was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
